What may have happened inside a small madrassa last month in this impoverished mixed Muslim-Hindu village of Sarawa has roiled religious sensitivities.

Hindu nationalists from Narendra Modi's BJP Party have seized on the case.
District party leader Sanjay Prajapati says the special community - meaning Muslim - has harmed his Hindu community, India's largest.

Termed Hindutva - a compendium of Hindu values, virtues, customs and history - that the RSS says binds India in a shared heritage.
